#include<algorithm>
#include<iostream>
#include<cstdio>
#include<vector>
#include<fstream>
#include<iomanip>
#include<bitset>
#include<deque>
#include<queue>
#include<string>
#include<map>
#include<cstring>
#include<sstream>
#include<cmath>
using namespace std;
 #define gc getchar_unlocked


void scanint(int &x)
{
register int c = gc();
x = 0;
for(;(c<48 || c>57);c = gc());
for(;c>47 && c<58;c = gc()) {x = (x<<1) + (x<<3) + c - 48;}
}


int main()
{
    int t,i,count;
    char c[105],d;
    count=0;
    cin>>c>>d;
    for(i=0;i<strlen(c);i++)
    {
        if(c[i]==d)
        count++;
    }

    cout<<count<<"\n";





return 0;
}
